trans-unit.source: Static templates are a centrally distributed TypoScript library. You should never change these values.
trans-unit.target: Static templates are a centrally distributed TypoScript library. You should never change these values.

trans-unit.source: The Static templates are meant to be included by your TypoScript Template records depending on your needs. Refer to the 'TSref' document (see below) for details on this process. Notice that by each release of TYPO3 you should reinstall the Static Templates table by the install tool. See the 'Install/Upgrade' document for details (see below).
trans-unit.target: The Static templates are meant to be included by your TypoScript Template records depending on your needs. Refer to the 'TSref' document (see below) for details on this process. Notice that by each release of TYPO3 you should reinstall the Static Templates table by the install tool. See the 'Install/Upgrade' document for details (see below).

trans-unit.source: sys_template TSref | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/doc_core_tsref/ TypoScript by Example | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/doc_core_tsbyex/ Install/Upgrade | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/doc_inst_upgr/, sys_template:include_static
trans-unit.target: sys_template TSref | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/doc_core_tsref/ TypoScript by Example | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/doc_core_tsbyex/ Install/Upgrade | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/doc_inst_upgr/, sys_template:include_static

trans-unit.source: The static templates are located in the page tree root where only the Admin users can access them. However they are read-only by default so you can only look at their content, not change it.
trans-unit.target: The static templates are located in the page tree root where only the Admin users can access them. However they are read-only by default so you can only look at their content, not change it.

trans-unit.source: Template Title. Will be visible in the list of static templates in Template Records
trans-unit.target: Template Title. Will be visible in the list of static templates in Template Records

trans-unit.source: Description of the static template record.
trans-unit.target: Description of the static template record.

trans-unit.source: Editor Configuration - used to configure Stylesheet editor.
trans-unit.target: Editor Configuration - used to configure Stylesheet editor.
